Class BufferedSocketWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • skt.BufferedSocketWriter

  • public class BufferedSocketWriter
extends Object
    Write Messages to socket input stream.

    FIXME: Doesn't really buffer anything, just sends directly to socket.

    Author:
    Kyle
